name: Near Midnight
description: Taste the fear like never before
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel CPU Core i3 3.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3,4 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 Storage: 5 GB available space
